ygData.subject: Re: Mana items...
ygData.msgSnippet: Mana items add to you mana.  They have nothing to do with meditation or mana regen.  There is a stone that affects that, but you would have no chance to get it
ygData.messageBody:
Mana items add to you mana. They have nothing to do with meditation or mana
regen. There is a stone that affects that, but you would have no chance to
get it for another 30 lvls or so :) Not sure if there are any others that
affect mana regen that i don't know about.


Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 1:42 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Mana items...


>From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
>
>What are some mana items I can get for myself at 13th level?
>
>I'm saving up a bit to get two mana rings, and I'll be buying a mages +mana
>robe.
>
>
>What else can I have a shot at getting at my level? I'm on my way tonight
>to Paw, hoping to get a runed totem staff, and to Qeynos to hopefully get
>some of the special quest belts and boots or whatever that any class can
wear.
>
>Does anyone have any leads on other items that someone of my level could
>possibly get? With a group of 3-4 people?
>
>
>
>And lastly, how much of an impact do +mana items have on meditation? For
>example, if I'm doing good, I may be able to get two rings, a runed totem
>pole and a robe that will give me a total of +16 mana. Will I notice any
>differnce in my meditation?
>
>
>Thanks,
>Flik
>
